I've sort of been fixing my comp lately, and I had to reform... 
again. Oh well, i suppose that's what i get for using WinXP; new OS 
= new bugs. =P

I don't think i've read the post concerning the energon being shot 
out of his (whoever he is) mouth, but I think that if your (dewboy) 
character is shooting energon out of his mouth, it's not going to be 
that powerful because it'll have to be in lessened amounts. It's not 
a slag fest, so don't just try to kill each other, rp it out; and, 
generally speaking, when there is a fight, both sides usually get 
damaged. =P

Yah, nuclear firepower and any nuclear type weapons are not allowed 
at the moment. (and probably for a while)
